termsscreen.title: Before You start....
termsscreen.subtitle:
To ensure a safe and legal environment,
Please review and accept our terms.
termsscreen.age_confirmation: I certify that I am 18 years of age or older.
termsscreen.privacy_policy: I have read a * Privacy Policy and consent to the processing to my profile, photos, and messages.
termsscreen.accept_error: Failed to accept terms. Please try again.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.section1_content: By accessing and using this dating application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.section2_content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service. By using this app, you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority, and capacity to enter into this agreement.
terms.section3_content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.section4_content: You agree not to use the service to upload, post, or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.
terms.section5_content: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and use your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using this app, you consent to our collection and use of your information.
terms.section6_content: You retain ownership of all content you submit, post, or display on or through the service. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, copy, and display such content.
terms.section7_content: You may not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not transmit any worms, viruses, or any code of a destructive nature.
terms.section8_content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time without prior notice or liability for any reason, including breach of these Terms.
terms.section9_content: The service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
terms.section10_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
